channel.title: Patch v4.0.2 Notes - Celebrating the Year of Ox
channel.description:
Greetings!
> A new patch is live to improve the gaming environment in the King's Courtroom! To celebrate the Year of Ox, all active citizens in the past 30 days shall receive 4000 Gold, and all new citizens of the King's Courtroom will now start their new life with 5000 Gold! Hooray! > > Patch 4.02 offers some minor redecorations to improve the gaming environment! Citizens of the Castle Adiart can now find game tips in the lobby and enjoy a more secure and stable gameplay experience!
## ***Patch Highlights***
* The Year of Ox event grants 4000 Gold to all players who have been active since January 1st, 2021. * New registered players will start the game with 5000 Gold. * We added a tip function in the lobby so players can enjoy miscellaneous game knowledge and tips during the queue.
## ***System and Game Improvements***
* Fixed players' logs format on copy and paste function. * Improved Lobby UI by removing the number of players to avoid confusion. * Improved BUY GOLD interface and functions. * Improved moderation security and interface. * Improved game stabilities and minor bugs fixed.
See you in the King's Courtroom!
